description: The round payoff this round was 5. You, John chose to play option 1.Kate chose to play option 2. You received a payoff of -5.
The other player, Kate, tends to choose option 2, which can lead to negative payoffs for John if he chooses option 1
John should consider adjusting his strategy to anticipate Kate's choices, especially since she has a tendency to choose option 2
The game dynamics suggest that cooperation (both choosing option 1) may be a safer strategy to avoid negative payoffs, but it requires both players to align their choices
